title: Love on the Dark Side
description: Fantasy, vampires, shape-shifters, time travel and fairy tales with an erotic twist... in a cutting-edge anthology of short stories... For your pleasure, Black Lace has woven together the weird and wonderful characters, creatures, times and dimensions of imaginary realms and given them a unique erotic spin. This collection will transport you into new worlds, where sighs of passion mingle with cries of terror. Your thoughts and feelings about the erotic may never be the same.
author: Mathilde Madden
